QuestData.Title: Feed or Be Eaten
QuestData.Description: After years of working with the Kunchong I developed a theory; raising one from infancy would strengthen the bond and therefore strengthen the sonic connection.$b$bI had just begun training Kovok when I was chosen for encasement. He is still very young and will need diligent training to reach his full potential.$b$bI'm entrusting Kovok to you, but be warned; if any harm comes to him your life is forfeit.$b$bFirst, you must feed him to gain his trust. The turtles in the area should be suitable for this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Begin Kovok's training by feeding him 6 Succulent Turtle Filets found on the Brineshell Snappers in the Briny Muck.
QuestData.RewardText: Very good! I had half expected Kovok to just eat you. What a pleasant surprise to see you both in one piece.$b$bPerhaps Kunchong raising is in your blood.

Objectives.Objective: Succulent Turtle Filets fed to Kovok
